name: jcf/dotfiles
tagline: Opinionated configuration files for ZSH, Vim, Homebrew.
body: # dotfiles To get started you'll want to install Homebrew as it's required to install development dependencies. With Homebrew installed there's a dotfiles executable in `bin/dotfiles`. ``` sh PATH="./bin:$PATH" dotfiles setup ``` All the logic behind `dotfiles` can be found in the libexec directory. # License Unless otherwise stated, everything is covered by the MIT license. # Screenshots
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
